STATE v. EDGE. No. COA05-328. North Carolina Court of Appeals. Filed December 20, 2005. Certification Date January 9, 2006. Appeal from Cumberland (99CRS72607, 99CRS72612, 99CRS72613, 99CRS72614, 99CRS72615, 99CRS72616, 99CRS72617, 99CRS72618, 99CRS72619)

Case without published opinion. No error.
